Toggle Menu

salt.cloud.clouds.gogrid

GoGrid Cloud Module

The GoGrid cloud module. This module interfaces with the gogrid public cloud service. To use Salt Cloud with GoGrid log into the GoGrid web interface and create an api key. Do this by clicking on "My Account" and then going to the API Keys tab.

depends

libcloud >= 0.13.2

Set up the cloud configuration at /etc/salt/cloud.providers or /etc/salt/cloud.providers.d/gogrid.conf: 

my-gogrid-config:
  # The generated api key to use
  apikey: asdff7896asdh789
  # The apikey's shared secret
  sharedsecret: saltybacon

  provider: gogrid

avail_images

Syntax

salt.cloud.clouds.gogrid.avail_images(
								conn=None,
								call=None
								)

Details

Return a dict of all available VM images on the cloud provider with relevant data

avail_sizes

Syntax

salt.cloud.clouds.gogrid.avail_sizes(
								conn=None,
								call=None
								)

Details

Return a dict of all available VM images on the cloud provider with relevant data

create

Syntax

salt.cloud.clouds.gogrid.create(
								vm_
								)

Details

Create a single VM from a data dict

destroy

Syntax

salt.cloud.clouds.gogrid.destroy(
								name,
								conn=None,
								call=None
								)

Details

Delete a single VM

get_configured_provider

Syntax

salt.cloud.clouds.gogrid.get_configured_provider( )

Details

Return the first configured instance.

get_conn

Syntax

salt.cloud.clouds.gogrid.get_conn( )

Details

Return a conn object for the passed VM data

get_image

Syntax

salt.cloud.clouds.gogrid.get_image(
								conn,
								vm_
								)

Details

Return the image object to use

get_size

Syntax

salt.cloud.clouds.gogrid.get_size(
								conn,
								vm_
								)

Details

Return the VM's size object

list_nodes

Syntax

salt.cloud.clouds.gogrid.list_nodes(
								conn=None,
								call=None
								)

Details

Return a list of the VMs that are on the provider

list_nodes_full

Syntax

salt.cloud.clouds.gogrid.list_nodes_full(
								conn=None,
								call=None
								)

Details

Return a list of the VMs that are on the provider, with all fields

list_nodes_select

Syntax

salt.cloud.clouds.gogrid.list_nodes_select(
								conn=None,
								call=None
								)

Details

Return a list of the VMs that are on the provider, with select fields

script

Syntax

salt.cloud.clouds.gogrid.script(
								vm_
								)

Details

Return the script deployment object

show_instance

Syntax

salt.cloud.clouds.gogrid.show_instance(
								name,
								call=None
								)

Details

Show the details from the provider concerning an instance
